name: Cyncyn
text: Loving this watch!! Not having to have my phone next to me to receive calls or messages was the reason I purchased this. All the other features are added bonus!

name: Yvonne
text: I totally Love my new Apple Watch . It motivates me to challenge myself every day at the gym . I am able to time myself on every equipment ( rowing machine , indoor cycling , the stair stepper etc. ) that I use every day and I try to beat my previous time.

name: Khooey1
text: I love the watch. I had the series 2 and upgraded. This watch response time is faster and seems more in line with delivery. I would skip the cellular option if u have your phone near you at all times. The Bluetooth connection is enough.

name: Panza
text: I bought my iwatch to test if I will like to use every day and I love it. I was refusing to buy thinking looks unusual but after two weeks I change my mind.

name: Dae14
text: This watch is my new favorite thing in the world! Water resistant, comfortable, classy yet casual all at the same time! Absolutely amazing and worth every penny!!!!
